1: -module(vehicle_SUITE).
    2: -include("public_transport.hrl").
    3: -include("time.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl"). %% For assertion macros
    6: 
    7: -export([ checkin_ok_case/1
    8:         , boarding_passenger_capacity_reached_case/1
    9:         , boarding_passenger_below_capacity_case/1
   10:         , next_stop_reached_case/1
   11:         , next_stop_reached_snow_case/1
   12:         , next_stop_reached_rain_case/1
   13:         , next_stop_not_reached_case/1
   14:         , next_stop_not_reached_snow_case/1
   15:         , next_stop_not_reached_rain_case/1
   16:         , target_stop_reached_case/1
   17:         , increment_boarding_passenger_case/1
   18:         , new_time_not_driving_case/1]).
   19: 
   20: -export([ all/0
   21:         , init_per_testcase/2
   22:         , end_per_testcase/2]).
   23: 
   24: all() ->
   25:   [ checkin_ok_case
   26:   , boarding_passenger_capacity_reached_case
   27:   , boarding_passenger_below_capacity_case
   28:   , next_stop_reached_case
   29:   , next_stop_reached_snow_case
   30:   , next_stop_reached_rain_case
   31:   , next_stop_not_reached_case
   32:   , next_stop_not_reached_snow_case
   33:   , next_stop_not_reached_rain_case
   34:   , target_stop_reached_case
   35:   , increment_boarding_passenger_case
   36:   , new_time_not_driving_case
   37:   ].
   38: 
   39: init_per_testcase(Config) ->
   40:   vehicle_supervisor:start_link(),
   41:   StartStop = gen_server_mock:start(stop, startstop, strict),
   42:   TargetStop = gen_server_mock:start(stop, targetstop, strict),
   43:   Time = gen_server_mock:start_global(time, time, strict),
   44:   PT = gen_server_mock:start_local(public_transport, public_transport, strict),
   45:   W  = gen_server_mock:start_local(weather, weather, strict),
   46:   S1 = gen_server_mock:start(stop, s1, strict),
   47:   P1 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p1, strict),
   48:   P2 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p2, strict),
   49:   P3 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p3, strict),
   50:   P4 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p4, strict),
   51: 
   52:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, TargetStop]),
   53: 
   54:   Config ++ [ {startstop, StartStop}
   55:             , {targetstop, TargetStop}
   56:             , {time, Time}
   57:             , {pt, PT}
   58:             , {w, W}
   59:             , {s1, S1}
   60:             , {p1, P1}
   61:             , {p2, P2}
   62:             , {p3, P3}
   63:             , {p4, P4}
   64:             ].
   65: 
   66: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   67:   UpdatedConfig = init_per_testcase(Config),
   68:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, UpdatedConfig),
   69:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, UpdatedConfig),
   70:   Time = ?config(time, UpdatedConfig),
   71:   PT = ?config(pt, UpdatedConfig),
   72:   HasThreeCapacity = lists:member(TestCase, [ checkin_ok_case
   73:                                             , boarding_passenger_capacity_reached_case
   74:                                             , boarding_passenger_below_capacity_case
   75:                                             , new_time_not_driving_case
   76:                                             ]),
   77:   HasFourCapacity = lists:member(TestCase, [ next_stop_reached_case
   78:                                            , next_stop_reached_snow_case
   79:                                            , next_stop_reached_rain_case
   80:                                            , next_stop_not_reached_case
   81:                                            , next_stop_not_reached_snow_case
   82:                                            , next_stop_not_reached_rain_case
   83:                                            , target_stop_reached_case
   84:                                            , increment_boarding_passenger_case
   85:                                            ]),
   86:   Vehicle = vehicle_supervisor:start_vehicle(if
   87:                                                HasThreeCapacity -> 3;
   88:                                                HasFourCapacity -> 4
   89:                                              end, 1, TargetStop, bus),
   90:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(Time, {?SUBSCRIBE, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
   91:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
   92: 
   93:   [{vehicle, Vehicle}|UpdatedConfig].
   94: 
   95: 
   96: 
   97: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   98:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
   99:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  100:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  101:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  102:   W = ?config(w, Config),
  103:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  104:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  105:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  106:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  107:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  108:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  109:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(StartStop)),
  110:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(TargetStop)),
  111:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(Time)),
  112:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(PT)),
  113:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(W)),
  114:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(S1)),
  115:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P1)),
  116:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P2)),
  117:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P3)),
  118:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P4)),
  119:   gen_server_mock:stop(StartStop),
  120:   gen_server_mock:stop(TargetStop),
  121:   gen_server_mock:stop(Time),
  122:   gen_server_mock:stop(PT),
  123:   gen_server_mock:stop(W),
  124:   gen_server_mock:stop(S1),
  125:   gen_server_mock:stop(P1),
  126:   gen_server_mock:stop(P2),
  127:   gen_server_mock:stop(P3),
  128:   gen_server_mock:stop(P4),
  129:   vehicle_supervisor:stop_vehicle(Vehicle),
  130:   Config.
  131: 
  132: 
  133: checkin_ok_case(Config) ->
  134:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  135:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  136:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  137:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  138:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  139:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  140:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  141:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  142:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  143:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  144: 
  145:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  146:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  147:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  148:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 0, true).
  149: 
  150: boarding_passenger_capacity_reached_case(Config) ->
  151:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  152:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  153:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  154:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  155:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  156:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  157:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  158:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  159:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  160:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  161: 
  162:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 4, true),
  163:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  164:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  165: 
  166:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  167:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  168:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  169:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok),
  170:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P4), nok).
  171: 
  172: boarding_passenger_below_capacity_case(Config) ->
  173:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  174:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  175:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  176:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  177:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  178:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  179:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  180:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  181:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  182:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  183: 
  184:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 3, true),
  185:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  186:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  187: 
  188:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  189:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  190:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  191:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok).
  192: 
  193: next_stop_reached_case(Config) ->
  194:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  195:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  196:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  197:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  198:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  199:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  200:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  201:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  202:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  203:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  204: 
  205:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 3, true),
  206:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  207:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  208: 
  209:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  210:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  211:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  212:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok),
  213: 
  214:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(weather_controller, type, sunny),
  215:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, leave),
  216:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, stay),
  217:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, stay),
  218:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(S1, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  219:   vehicle:?NEW_TIME(Vehicle, 1234+5, true).
  220: 
  221: next_stop_reached_snow_case(Config) ->
  222:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  223:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  224:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  225:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  226:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  227:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  228:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  229:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  230:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  231:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  232: 
  233:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 3, true),
  234:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  235:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  236: 
  237:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  238:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  239:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  240:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok),
  241: 
  242:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(weather_controller, type, snowy),
  243:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, leave),
  244:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, stay),
  245:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, stay),
  246:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(S1, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  247:   vehicle:?NEW_TIME(Vehicle, 1234+7, true).
  248: 
  249: next_stop_reached_rain_case(Config) ->
  250:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  251:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  252:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  253:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  254:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  255:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  256:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  257:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  258:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  259:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  260: 
  261:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 3, true),
  262:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  263:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  264: 
  265:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  266:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  267:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  268:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok),
  269: 
  270:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(weather_controller, type, rainy),
  271:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, leave),
  272:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, stay),
  273:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, stay),
  274:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(S1, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  275:   vehicle:?NEW_TIME(Vehicle, 1234+6, true).
  276: 
  277: next_stop_not_reached_case(Config) ->
  278:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  279:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  280:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  281:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  282:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  283:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  284:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  285:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  286:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  287:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  288: 
  289:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 3, true),
  290:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  291:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  292: 
  293:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  294:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  295:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  296:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok),
  297: 
  298:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(weather_controller, type, sunny),
  299: 
  300:   vehicle:?NEW_TIME(Vehicle, 1234+4, true).
  301: 
  302: next_stop_not_reached_snow_case(Config) ->
  303:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  304:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  305:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  306:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  307:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  308:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  309:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  310:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  311:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  312:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  313: 
  314:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 3, true),
  315:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  316:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  317: 
  318:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  319:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  320:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  321:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok),
  322: 
  323:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(weather_controller, type, snowy),
  324: 
  325:   vehicle:?NEW_TIME(Vehicle, 1234+6, true).
  326: 
  327: next_stop_not_reached_rain_case(Config) ->
  328:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  329:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  330:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  331:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  332:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  333:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  334:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  335:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  336:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  337:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  338: 
  339:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 3, true),
  340:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  341:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  342: 
  343:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  344:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  345:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  346:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok),
  347: 
  348:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(weather_controller, type, rainy),
  349: 
  350:   vehicle:?NEW_TIME(Vehicle, 1234+5, true).
  351: 
  352: target_stop_reached_case(Config) ->
  353:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  354:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  355:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  356:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  357:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  358:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  359:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  360:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  361:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  362:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  363: 
  364:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 3, true),
  365:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  366:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  367: 
  368:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, TargetStop]),
  369:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  370:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  371:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok),
  372: 
  373:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(weather_controller, type, sunny),
  374:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, TargetStop]),
  375:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, leave),
  376:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, stay),
  377:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, Vehicle}, stay),
  378:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(TargetStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  379: 
  380:   vehicle:?NEW_TIME(Vehicle, 1234+5, true).
  381: 
  382: increment_boarding_passenger_case(Config) ->
  383:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  384:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  385:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  386:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  387:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  388:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  389:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  390:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  391:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  392:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  393: 
  394:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 2, true),
  395:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P1), ok),
  396: 
  397:   vehicle:?INCREMENT_BOARDING_PASSENGER(Vehicle, true),
  398:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P2), ok),
  399: 
  400:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  401:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  402:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  403:   ?assertEqual(vehicle:?PASSENGER_BOARD(Vehicle, P3), ok).
  404: 
  405: new_time_not_driving_case(Config) ->
  406:   StartStop = ?config(startstop, Config),
  407:   TargetStop = ?config(targetstop, Config),
  408:   Time = ?config(time, Config),
  409:   PT = ?config(pt, Config),
  410:   S1 = ?config(s1, Config),
  411:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  412:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  413:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  414:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  415:   Vehicle = ?config(vehicle, Config),
  416: 
  417:   vehicle:?NEW_TIME(Vehicle, 1233, true),
  418: 
  419:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(public_transport, ?LINE_ID(bus, 1), [StartStop, 5, S1, 7, TargetStop]),
  420:   gen_server_mock:expect_ets_lookup(time, time, 1234),
  421:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(StartStop, {?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT, Vehicle, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Vehicle)}),
  422:   vehicle:?CHECKIN_OK(Vehicle, StartStop, 0, true).
